offline.title: Activate/Update/Deactivate your License
offline.upload_msg: Drag and Drop your Request File in this box or Select it using the Browse button below.
offline.upload_msg2: (Please drag and drop or select only one file at a time.)
offline.download_msg: Please download your license installer file, place it on the computer which created the request file and double click it to activate (update) your license.
offline.download_msg_cml: Please download the license file and drag/drop or browse it on the Activation Tool in the product.
offline.invalid_file: The given request file is invalid.
offline.customer_form_title: Please enter the following information and hit Submit. The link to download the license file will be emailed to you.
offline.customer_submit_success: Request submitted successfully. Please check your email for the license. If you did not receive the email, please try again or contact Support.
offline.customer_submit_error: There was an error processing this request. Please contact Support.
offline.opt_in_msg: I consent to receive Oqton Communications
offline.opt_in_desc1: Would you like to receive special offers, product updates, and event news from Oqton? By accepting you agree to receive follow-up communications from Oqton or our partners. You can also choose to opt out of communications at any time. Please
offline.opt_in_desc2: click here to view our Privacy Policy
offline.opt_in_desc3: click here to manage your Preferences.

This is a sample license file created to check if it is correctly generated

errors.1: This Activation Code could not be recognized. Please check your activation code.
errors.3: This Activation Code does not match the product you are trying to activate. Please check your activation code.
errors.4: This Activation Code does not match the license type you are trying to activate.
errors.5: All seats for this Activation Code license are being used on other machines.
errors.7: You need to be on active maintenance in order to update to a newer version.
errors.8: This Activation Code could not be recognized. Please check your activation code.
errors.11: A trial for this version of this product was already used on this machine.
errors.14: This evaluation Activation Code was already activated on a different machine.
errors.17: This Activation Code is already in use on another machine.
errors.18: The license file could not be generated. Please try again later or contact support.
errors.20: The license file could not be generated. Please try again later or contact support.
errors.22: Failed to submit the information. Please try again later.
errors.24: Some seats for this license have been borrowed. Please ask the borrowers to return the seats before deactivating the license.
errors.25: The license that was borrowed on this PC was already returned.
errors.26: License has already been borrowed for this machine.
errors.27: Cannot borrow license since there is no license activated on the server.
errors.28: License cannot be borrowed for invalid return date.
errors.30: You can activate up to {0} dongle(s) for this activation code and you already used dongle(s) {1}.
errors.31: Trial license for this product is temporarily unavailable.
errors.33: Your request for a trial license is being processed. If approved, email will be sent to the provided address.
errors.34: Trial license could not be issued. Please contact Support at https://support.3dsystems.com/s/contact-support-page.
errors.36:
The request file is for Geomagic products. Please go to below page and try again.
